revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #29 Rabuta |image = [[File:Rabuta.png]] |caption = Malgré son goût amer, il est recommandé de la manger en entier, même la peau. Les poils de sa peau nettoient l'estomac. |growtime = 3h 24m 0s |harvest = 28 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,03% |points = 600 |flavor =
*0 épicée *0 sèche *0 sucrée *20 amère *10 acide }} '''Rabuta''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle peut être obtenue en entourant une [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] avec au moins 1 [[Aguav/fr|Gowav]]. La [[Aspear/fr|Willia]] aura alors des chances de muter en Rabuta. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Baie |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 38 mins 30 secs || 1 heure 30 mins || 2 heures 38 mins 20 secs || 3 heures 24 mins - 6 heures 48 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RabutaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RabutaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:RabutaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Temps de croissance avec modificateurs === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificateur !! Temps maturité-flétrissement !! Nombre de Fertipousse requis |- ! Aucun | 3 heures 24 mins -
6 heures 48 mins || --- |- ! Engrais ou Kwakarroisoir | 2 heures 16 mins -
4 heures 32 mins || 28 engrais |- ! Engrais et Kwakarroisoir | 1 heure 30 mins 40 secs -
3 heures 1 min 20 secs || 19 engrais |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Rabuta_Flow_Chart.png|250px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Rabuta berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="width: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
'''[[Aspear]]''' || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
'''[[Aspear]]''' |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]
'''[[Aspear]]''' || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]]
[[Aguav]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="width: 50px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | [[File:Aspear.png|30px]]

[[Aguav]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aguav]] || - || - || - |- | [[Aspear]] || 2 mins until ripe || 1 min 20 secs until ripe || Not Practical |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Rabuta berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Durin.png|20px]] [[Durin]] || - |- | [[File:Colbur.png|20px]] [[Colbur]] || [[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]]
[[File:Kasib.png|20px]] [[Kasib]] |- |}

*0 épicée *0 sèche *0 sucrée *20 amère *10 acide }}
'''Rabuta''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an [[Aspear]] with at least 1 [[Aguav]]. The [[Aspear]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.

[[File:RabutaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}

6 hours 48 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours 16 mins -
4 hours 32 mins || 28 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 30 mins 40 secs -
3 hours 1 min 20 secs || 19 mulch |}

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #29 Rabuta |image = [[File:Rabuta.png]] |caption = Even though it is bitter, it should be eaten peel and all. The hair on the peel cleans the stomach from the inside. |growtime = 3h 24m 0s |harvest = 28 berries |replant = 10% |mutation = 0.03% |points = 600 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *20 bitter *10 sour }}
'''Rabuta''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an [[Aspear]] with at least 1 [[Aguav]]. The [[Aspear]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.

4 hours 32 mins || 28 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 30 mins 40 secs -
